title: Palms Up Together Light Skin Tone
description: Two hands held open and facing upwards, with a light skin tone. Often used to express prayer, pleading, offering, or receiving.
apple_vendor_description: The light skin tone palms up together emoji on Apple devices is rendered with a soft, inviting glow, as if gently cupped to receive or offer something. Apple's realistic lighting emphasizes the smooth, rounded surfaces of the palms, creating a sense of humility and openness. This emoji is often used to express prayer, gratitude, or a hopeful plea, embodying a gesture of supplication or offering.
